nodes.text: Vakk was a male Gand findsman who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Empire.
Vakk joined the crew of a rebellious young smuggler, and carried out various missions on the smuggler's behalf throughout the Anoat sector.

Vakk first appeared in Star Wars canon in the multiplayer mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, created by the Kabam company and released on September 10, 2015 for iOS and Android platforms. Within the scope of the game, Vakk acts as a potential crewmate for the player character, able to be tasked with carrying out timed quests to recover valuable experience points and loot.
